data.title: Fordham Athletics Honors the Class of 2024
data.meta_description: A total of 124 Ram student-athletes graduated with Fordham University degrees this past weekend. The university honored its graduates with a main ceremony on Edwards
data.text:
124 Rams receive degrees at commencement ceremonies

Fordham University Commencement Page

Bronx, N.Y. - A total of 124 Ram student-athletes graduated with Fordham University degrees this past weekend. The university honored its graduates with a main ceremony on Edwards Parade before the individual schools split up for the diploma presentations.

The Rams won six conference championships over the past four years with seven NCAA appearances. During each of the Class of 2024's four years, Fordham Athletics achieved a cumulative GPA of over 3.3. Also, over the past four years, Fordham student-athletes graduated at a higher rate than the general student population.

Congratulations to all the Ram student-athletes and all students on graduating from Rose Hill. Below is a list of the Fordham Student-Athletes eligible for graduation.
